# traitCollection

**Instance Property**

A collection of traits that describes orientation and other characteristics of the snapshot.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying var traitCollection: UITraitCollection { get set }
```

## Customizing Snaphot Appearance

- **pointOfInterestFilter**: A filter to use to customize what map features are visible in the snapshot.
- **size**: The requested size of the snapshot image.
